about_the_game:
Brush up your leopard grace, get the gold of all the desert sands and the greatness of the sun as a bonus. It's Cleopatra! The great queen of Egypt is ready to give you the vacant seat of her favorite cat. Together you will bring everyone to their knees within a radius of the Business Tour. You will build a monopoly which Ra himself never seen before! 100 gold, 50,000 chips and the legendary dice will be a good start for this.

By purchasing this content, you get the Cleopatra character, Cleopatra dice, 100 gold and 50.000 chips.
